name: 2016 Asia-Pacific Conference on Social Sciences and Management
content: 2016 Asia-Pacific Conference on Social Science and Management will be held in Cebu, Philippines, during January 19-21, 2016\. It is one of the leading international conferences for presenting novel and fundamental advances in the fields of social science and management. It also serves to foster communication among researchers and practitioners working in a wide variety of scientific areas with a common interest in social science and management. Prospective authors are invited to submit abstracts, full papers and original research papers, which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals.
